suppress.notes: Issue is a only relevant to Eclipse IDE. The flagged component is not used in this project.
Issue is only relevant to Eclipse Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools (BIRT). The flagged component is not used in this project.
Issue is only relevant to NTP (Network Time Protocol) daemon. The flagged component is not used in this project.
Issue is only relevant to RESTful web services module for Drupal. The flagged component is not used in this project.
Issue is only relevant to RESTful web services module for Drupal. The flagged component is not used in this project.

Airline is a "Java annotation-based framework for parsing Git like command line structures." The reported issue is only relevant to Git project. Hence, the flagged component is not used in this project.

Airline is a "Java annotation-based framework for parsing Git like command line structures." The reported issue is only relevant to Git project. Hence, the flagged component is not used in this project.
The issue is only applicable to "paxtar" tape archiver (linux tool). The flagged component is not used in this project.
The issue is only applicable to "Docker Engine". The flagged component is not bundled with this project.
The issue is only applicable to "Gradle" build automation tool. The flagged component is not bundled with this project.
commons_collections:3.2.1 is used in "io.fabric8:docker-client:1.2.1" as a transitive dependency of "io.sundr:builder-annotations:0.4.2". However, the flagged component is not bundled with Ballerina.
log4j is used in "msf4j-core" as a transitive dependency of "org.wso2.carbon:org.wso2.carbon.runtime.feature". However, the flagged component is not bundled with Ballerina.
log4j is used in "msf4j-core" as a transitive dependency of "org.wso2.carbon:org.wso2.carbon.runtime.feature". However, the flagged component is not bundled with Ballerina.
BeanShell is only used in TestNG during test execution. The flagged component is not bundled with Ballerina.
